modName: Dx's Follower - The cursed Paladin - DELETED
summary:
His Story started many years ago, as Paladin he used to fight the evil of the world, leaving his Wife and two Sons back behind.
With some other man, he had a fight against an strong, evil witch.
One after another died during the long fight, only one could survive.
The Paladin got cursed by the witch, moments befor he cut
